item.title: Air crafter
item.dc:creator: @blackhat blackhat
item.description:
@blackhat wrote:

it dont work with lates i fixed it thoug ill tell you all how:

First oven the .java file aircrafter the fond the object id for the BOOTH

Go into ARyan and click on booth and see the object id comes up, well change the old id to the new id and save and compile. easy

u now have a updated air script,
BTW this will work with any script that dont work, jsut cahnge the id’s. to the new ones

item.title: Air crafter
item.dc:creator: @r00nboi r00nboi
item.description:
@r00nboi wrote:

got this 1 off rs-resources.com

Script by me, made recently. Flawless made over 150k air runes.

-Start at Fally East Bank

-Have an Air Tiara Wielded

-Have lots of rune essence in bank

[code]/*

Air Rune Crafter 
(C) Usa

*/

public class AirCraft extends Script
{
public static String[] commands = { “air”, “airCraft” };
private int tripsDone;
private int totalRunes;
private static final Tile[] BANK_TO_RUINS = new Tile[]{
new Tile(3012,3356),
new Tile(3006,3354),
new Tile(3006,3349),
new Tile(3006,3343),
new Tile(3006,3335),
new Tile(3006,3324),
new Tile(3003,3318),
new Tile(2999,3312),
new Tile(2994,3302),
new Tile(2993,3295),
new Tile(2989,3291)
};
private final int OBJECT_RUINS = 2452;
private final int OBJECT_PORTAL = 2465;
private final int OBJECT_ALTAR = 2478;
private final int OBJECT_BOOTH = 11758;

private final int ITEM_AIR_RUNE = 556;
private final int ITEM_ESSENCE = 1436;
private final int ITEM_BEER = 1917;
private final int ITEM_KEBAB = 1971;

private int step = 0;

public boolean start(String cmd, String[] args) {
            log("Air Rune Crafter : Written by Usa. D0nt L3ech Newbie!!1!11! :)");
	return true;
}
public long run(long lastExecution) {
	if(inCombat(myPlayer()) && getRun() == false) {
		setRun(true);
		return random(1000,2000);
	}
	switch(step) {
		case 0:
			return do_bank();
		case 1:
			return do_walk(false);
		case 2:
			return do_walk(true);
		case 3:
			if(findObject(OBJECT_RUINS) != -1) {
				atObject(findObject(OBJECT_RUINS),1);
			} else {
				step = 4;
				return 500 + random(500,1000);
			}
			return 2000 + random(500,1000);
		case 4:
			return do_craft();
		case 5:
			if(findObject(OBJECT_PORTAL) != -1) {
				atObject(findObject(OBJECT_PORTAL),1);
				return 1250 + random(500,1000);
			} else {
				step = 2;
				return 500 + random(500,1000);
			}
	}
	return 500 + random(500,1000);
}
public long do_craft() {
	if(inventoryCount(ITEM_ESSENCE) > 0) {
		if(findObject(OBJECT_ALTAR) != -1) {
			atObject(findObject(OBJECT_ALTAR),1);
			return 1000 + random(500,1000);
		} else {
			step = 5;
			return 2500 + random(1500,3000);
		}
	} else {
		log("# Crafted Air Runes... Heading back to Bank !");
		step = 5;
		return 2000;
	}
}
public long do_report() {
	tripsDone = tripsDone + 1;
	totalRunes = totalRunes + inventoryCount(ITEM_AIR_RUNE);
	log("-------------------------------------");
	log("   Trips Completed: " + tripsDone);
	log("Total Essence Used: " + totalRunes * 28);
	log("-------------------------------------");
	return 1;
}

public long do_bank() {
	do_report();
	if(inventoryCount(ITEM_ESSENCE) > 0 && inventoryCount(ITEM_AIR_RUNE) < 1 && inventoryCount(ITEM_KEBAB) < 1 && inventoryCount(ITEM_BEER) < 1) {
		step = 1;
		return 1000;
	} else {
		if(getInterface() != Constants.INTERFACE_BANK) {
			int booth = findObject(OBJECT_BOOTH);
			if(booth != -1) {
				atObject(booth, 2);
				return 2500 + random(500, 1000);
			} else {
				log("# Error: No Bank Booth Found.");
				return -1;
			}
		} else if(getInterface() == Constants.INTERFACE_BANK) {
			if(inventoryCount(ITEM_AIR_RUNE) > 0) {
				depositAll(ITEM_AIR_RUNE,getInventoryIndex(ITEM_AIR_RUNE));
				return 1750 + random(750,1250);
			} else if(inventoryCount(ITEM_BEER) > 0) {
				depositAll(ITEM_BEER,getInventoryIndex(ITEM_BEER));
				return 1500 + random(500,1000);
			} else if(inventoryCount(ITEM_KEBAB) > 0) {
				depositAll(ITEM_KEBAB,getInventoryIndex(ITEM_KEBAB));
				return 1500 + random(500,1000);
			} else if(inventoryCount(ITEM_ESSENCE) == 0) {
				// NO ESSENCE IN BANK SO QUITING...
				if(bankCount(ITEM_ESSENCE) < 1) {
					log("# Error: No Essence in Bank.");
					log("# EXITING !");
					return -1;
				} else {
					// ESSENCE IN BANK, WITHDRAWING...
					withdrawAll(ITEM_ESSENCE,getBankIndex(ITEM_ESSENCE));
					return random(1500,2500);
				}
			}
		}
	}
		return 1000 + random(1000,2000);
}
public long do_walk(boolean bank) {
	if(bank) {
		Tile[] path = reversePath(BANK_TO_RUINS);
		int distance = distanceTo(path[path.length - 1]);
		if(distance > 3) {
			walkPath(path, 15);
			return random(500,1000);
		} else {
			step = 0;
			return random(500,2000);
		}
	} else {
		Tile[] path = BANK_TO_RUINS;
		int distance = distanceTo(path[path.length - 1]);
		if(distance > 3) {
			walkPath(path, 15);
			return random(500,1000);
		} else {
			step = 3;
			return random(500,2000);
		}
	}
}

}[/code]

Read full topic
